name: Simple Space
description:
This is a game I made in a week time for a 1$ challenge.

If you liked the game, don't forget to post a comment to give me your impressions & share it with your friends !

If you really want to show me that you liked the game, you can purchase it for ONLY 1$ and get the standalone PC version as a reward (During the first day sale)

With the PC version, the game runs much faster

it's FAST AS FUCK BOYYYY !

Credits:

  • Music:

JudeDeck: Music from Jukedeck - create your own at http://jukedeck.com.

  • StarField Skybox:

Star Nest algorithm by Pablo Román AndrioliUnity 5.x & shader by Jonathan CohenThis
